duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and manage operational activities of production assemblers and technicians for specific elements of the production process.
Maintain, ramp-up, and downsize production levels as required, while ensuring high levels of on-time delivery, quality, and productivity.
Daily management of assemblers and technicians to meet operational goals and objectives, including capacity and materials planning, and implementation of improvement programs.
Ensure compliance with customer requirements, health and safety regulations, and other regulatory requirements.
Liaise with internal customers/departments to meet or exceed expected production demands.
Supervise, coach, and motivate direct reports and promote teamwork in the manufacturing environment. Report on key metrics to monitor progress and identify areas for improvement.

education_certification.credential: Associate’s degree (Bachelor’s Degree in engineering field preferred) or equivalent experience
